name: Scandinavian Minimal
prompt: A VibeDeck controller in Scandinavian minimalist design. Pale blonde birch wood with white painted accents. Simple clean lines, no unnecessary decoration. Soft rounded corners. Buttons are smooth white ceramic or pale wood. The rotary knob is natural wood grain. Muted pastel accent colors - soft sage green, dusty pink. Cozy wool cable cover. Hygge aesthetic. The LCD has a simple clean font. Soft natural daylight, white background.
why: Clean design, mass appeal, calming aesthetic
